name: Variable with the name of a planet in the Solar System.
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-4-task-8.png)

There are eight known planets in the solar system:
Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune.
Create a `planet` variable and assign it the value `'Saturn'`.

Here's an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const star = 'Sirius';
```
